description:
O&O ShutUp10++ is a free antispy tool for Windows 10 and 11 that allows users to control privacy settings and disable unwanted features.

O&O ShutUp10++ offers full control over Windows 10 and 11 privacy settings, enabling users to disable unwanted functions like telemetry, location services, and data sharing. It is a portable, free tool that requires no installation, providing an easy-to-use interface for adjusting security settings without the need for advanced IT knowledge. It supports multiple languages and is free for private, corporate, and educational use.
